article_title: Woodward: World 'Clearly' Less Safe Under Obama
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

On this weekend’s broadcast of “Fox News Sunday,” longtime political reporter Bob Woodward said the world is “clearly not” safer thanit was a year ago as President Barack Obama claimed last week in Hawaii.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“Is the world safer than it was a year ago?” host Chris Wallace asked.

Woodward replied, “Well, it clearly is not, and Obama has contradicted himself on that because he’s declared war on ISIS and said not just are we going to contain it but we are going to destroy it. So there’s lots of danger out there.”

Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
